title: Efficient Training of Chinese Listening - Intermediate Level | HSK 3 Listening Practice

media:group.media:title: Efficient Training of Chinese Listening - Intermediate Level | HSK 3 Listening Practice
media:group.media:description:
How good is your Chinese listening? Try this Chinese listening practice for intermediate level (HSK Level 3). You will hear some sentences and dialogues 3 times. The first time for the sound, the second time for the pictures, the third time for the answer. You need to write down the sentences  as you listen for the 1st and 2nd  times and then see how accurate you were in the 3rd time.
